text: Cosmochthoniidae is a family of cosmochthoniids in the order Oribatida. There are about 6 genera and at least 40 described species in Cosmochthoniidae. ==Genera== * Cosmochthonius Berlese, 1910 * Gozmanyina Balogh & Mahunka, 1983 * Krivolutskiella Gordeeva, 1980 * Nipponiella Gordeeva, 1980 * Phyllozetes Gordeeva, 1978 * Trichthonius Hammer, 1961 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Acariformes
title: Cosmochthoniidae
